title: African Union of Mutual Societies Re-Elects Brahim El Othmani as President
snippet: The General Assembly also elected individuals for the new executive board representing Senegal, Cameroon, Mali, Ivory Coast, Mauritania, Burundi, Tunisia and Chad, ensuring a diverse and inclusive leadership structure for the UAM. Beside the re-election, the gathering also tackled the presentation of the progress report on the implementation of the Union’s 2022-2025 strategic plan, in which the current strategic plan reviewed and assessed the progress made in the last three years toward their objectives.
